relation: Very, very safe, never heard of any problems or scares ever happening on campus.
Very reasonable, a wise pick to get your basics out of the way instead of paying the crazy money for your basics at a four year university.
great food and very lovely staff
I live off campus but I have toured the dorms and gone and seen some of my friends that lived in the dorms and they are very nice dorms.
Great to go to for your basics.
If you receive a scholarship do whatever you can to keep that scholarship, work your but off and study, study, study as hard as you have to, to be able to keep that scholarship.
I enjoy Arkansas State University-Beebe a lot. The teachers are kind and very helpful. Never to busy to go out of their way to help you with whatever you may need.
pageTitle: Arkansas State University-Beebe Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Comments Great for these types of students If you are wanting to study Criminal Justice, come and get in Dr. Larkins and Ms. Reed's program. They will turn you into amazing Crim students. Tips for prospective students If you want a great learning experience and people who care about you getting a degree, come to ASU Beebe. Bang for the buck I had to pay a little out of pocket but that was because I didn't have enough scholarships. Am enjoying being here The people are great. There are people from everywhere and listening to the things people have done are incredible. The dorms on campus are amazing! Am learning a lot I love ASU. Most of the teachers here are great they want you to learn. I was not planning on staying in college; however, I found out when I came to ASU how much I could learn. Login to rate or flag the reviews Brittny from Beebe, AR 09/22/2011 Reviewer
